08/25/2021, 10:55:40.Question: This musician visited the country of Mexico, where he composed the suite based on Mexican folk music. He also formed a friendship with the Mexican Composer Carlos Chavez to whom his second symphony is dedicated to. This composer also composed the opera The Tender Land and later wrote the orchestrated work Connotations. This man's third and final symphony was premiered by Serge Koussevitzky and it's final movement forms the basis of the Fanfare for the common man. This musician was motivated by the work of Toru Takemitsu of Japan. For ten points name this American Composer known for works like Rodeo and Appalachian Springs.
